Type.BattleDialog: Guys, as per usual, let’s proceed slowly… and carefully.
Let’s not think too deep, we might end up hesitating if we do.
Let’s not push ourselves too far, guys.
Good job, everyone! I knew I could count on you guys.
We made it without much trouble. Let’s head to Juli’s to celebrate.
This is all my fault… I shouldn’t have led my team here with so little information…
Both of us have things we can’t give up.
…This kind of work… really does not suit me.
Sorry. But we had to do this. We have our own matters to take care of…
Let’s keep it cool and do this.
This sword may look ridiculously big, but I have no problem wielding it in battle.
Huh, I heard they’re monsters, but they look just like ordinary humans.
The value of a sword all depends on who uses it.
See that, boss? I was much faster than that raging pea-hair.
I thought I could make it if I tried a little harder…
Maybe I should’ve told her how I feel.
You guys are just flailing around like idiots, don’t you see?
Piece of cake. Lulu is such a crybaby about it.
Too slow. I could see right through your moves.
Hey, step aside! Why don’t you stop standing around like an idiot and just fight me?!
C’mon, c’mon! I’m gonna smack you all!!
Stay alert. We can win this as long as we don’t let our guard down.
Yeah! Did you see that, boss? I’m sooo reliable, aren’t I?
I took them out with style, unlike Mister Nepotism over there~
They were tougher than they look… Things aren’t looking too good, so I’m backing off for now.
Hmhmm~ This is child’s play for me!
Yeah, yeah~ Lulu’s gotta take care of every one of ‘em for you!
Ever heard of the phrase, “Small peas bite harder”? No? …Well, you heard it now.
Bring it on, you pieces of shit!!!
You’re standing so shamelessly. Abominable bastards…
He didn’t come here to die like that… Fuck, this is all your fault.
I avenged you, Mars. That settles the price for the cake you bought, right? ……
You jerk… Why’d you let these weaklings get you…
I can’t go like this… I can’t die here all the same!!!
I have to… crush the skulls of those bastards…!
One fell. I gotta stay sharp.
…I can’t afford to care for others.
Mars kept fighting knowing he might die like that. I can’t lose to his guts.
It’s all your fault. Mars wouldn’t have died if it weren’t for you!
See that? I’m much stronger than the likes of you!
I’m not gonna stop here!!!
Yeah, you… I’m gonna crack your skull in half.
ARRRRRGH!!!! Shut up!!! I’ll beat you to death myself…
Yeah… You must be it. The leader of those bastards.
Shut up!!!
